fmt_guard.hpp File Reference

Detailed Description

Provides the stream_fmt class to aggregate the data that constitutes the "formatting state" of a std::iostream. 

    **  Copyright (c) 2006, Oliver Schoenborn

    **  LICENSE_IOF_1_0.txt in root folder of library for complete 
    **  terms and conditions).
